Build Query: Stats
template:
SELECT mac, pin,
    AVG(avg_temp) as avg_temp, MIN(min_temp) as min_temp, MAX(max_temp) as max_temp,
    AVG(avg_hum) as avg_hum, MIN(min_hum) as min_hum, MAX(max_hum) as max_hum
FROM dht_22
WHERE `timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND `timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
GROUP BY mac, pin

UNION ALL

SELECT mac, 'OVERALL' as pin,
    AVG(avg_temp) as avg_temp, MIN(min_temp) as min_temp, MAX(max_temp) as max_temp,
    AVG(avg_hum) as avg_hum, MIN(min_hum) as min_hum, MAX(max_hum) as max_hum
FROM dht_22
WHERE `timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND `timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
GROUP BY mac;

name: Build Query: Times
template:
-- Robust min/max time picking in local time (Asia/Bangkok window)
-- Per-sensor
SELECT
  t.mac,
  t.pin,
  (SELECT l.`timestamp` FROM dht_22 l
    WHERE l.mac = t.mac AND l.pin = t.pin
      AND l.`timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND l.`timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
    ORDER BY l.min_temp ASC, l.`timestamp` ASC LIMIT 1) AS time_min_temp,
  (SELECT l.`timestamp` FROM dht_22 l
    WHERE l.mac = t.mac AND l.pin = t.pin
      AND l.`timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND l.`timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
    ORDER BY l.max_temp DESC, l.`timestamp` ASC LIMIT 1) AS time_max_temp,
  (SELECT l.`timestamp` FROM dht_22 l
    WHERE l.mac = t.mac AND l.pin = t.pin
      AND l.`timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND l.`timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
    ORDER BY l.min_hum ASC, l.`timestamp` ASC LIMIT 1) AS time_min_hum,
  (SELECT l.`timestamp` FROM dht_22 l
    WHERE l.mac = t.mac AND l.pin = t.pin
      AND l.`timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND l.`timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
    ORDER BY l.max_hum DESC, l.`timestamp` ASC LIMIT 1) AS time_max_hum
FROM (
  SELECT mac, pin
  FROM dht_22
  WHERE `timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND `timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
  GROUP BY mac, pin
) AS t

UNION ALL

-- OVERALL per mac
SELECT
  t.mac,
  'OVERALL' AS pin,
  (SELECT l.`timestamp` FROM dht_22 l
    WHERE l.mac = t.mac
      AND l.`timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND l.`timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
    ORDER BY l.min_temp ASC, l.`timestamp` ASC LIMIT 1) AS time_min_temp,
  (SELECT l.`timestamp` FROM dht_22 l
    WHERE l.mac = t.mac
      AND l.`timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND l.`timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
    ORDER BY l.max_temp DESC, l.`timestamp` ASC LIMIT 1) AS time_max_temp,
  (SELECT l.`timestamp` FROM dht_22 l
    WHERE l.mac = t.mac
      AND l.`timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND l.`timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
    ORDER BY l.min_hum ASC, l.`timestamp` ASC LIMIT 1) AS time_min_hum,
  (SELECT l.`timestamp` FROM dht_22 l
    WHERE l.mac = t.mac
      AND l.`timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND l.`timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
    ORDER BY l.max_hum DESC, l.`timestamp` ASC LIMIT 1) AS time_max_hum
FROM (
  SELECT mac
  FROM dht_22
  WHERE `timestamp` >= '{{window.start}}' AND `timestamp` < '{{window.end}}'
  GROUP BY mac
) AS t;

template:
SELECT *
FROM alert_events
WHERE opened_at <  '{{window.end}}'
  AND COALESCE(closed_at, '9999-12-31 00:00:00') >= '{{window.start}}'
